perturbation.original_text: Client will provide to Excite all User Data collected by Client within thirty (30) days following the end of each calendar month during the term of this Agreement in a mutually-determined electronic format.
perturbation.changed_text: Client *may* provide to Excite all User Data collected by Client within thirty (30) days following the end of each calendar month during the term of this Agreement in a mutually-determined electronic format.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'will' to 'may' makes the provision of user data optional, conflicting with the original intention of mandatory data sharing. This could cause disputes regarding compliance and data analysis.

perturbation.original_text: Excite will in "good faith" ensure Client that the above mentioned banners and promotional placements will be more prominently presented than any other "competitive retailer's" banners or promotional placements for the term of the Agreement. For the purposes of this Agreement, a "competitive retailer" means an on-line department store comparable to Bloomingdale's, Macy's, Burdine's, Shopping.com, Chef's Catalog or iQVC.
perturbation.changed_text: Excite will use commercially reasonable efforts to ensure Client that the above mentioned banners and promotional placements will be prominently presented. For the purposes of this Agreement, a "competitive retailer" means *any* online retailer.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the "good faith" clause and replacing "more prominently presented than any other 'competitive retailer's' banners or promotional placements" with "prominently presented" weakens Excite's obligation. Also, changing the definition of 'competitive retailer' to include any online retailer broadens the scope, making it difficult for Excite to ensure prominence compared to every other retailer. This change weakens Client's protections within the contract.

perturbation.original_text: All undisputed payments that have accrued prior to the termination or expiration of this Agreement will be payable in full within thirty (30) days thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: All undisputed payments *may* be payable that have accrued prior to the termination or expiration of this Agreement within thirty (30) days thereof, subject to review and reconciliation.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'will be payable in full' to '*may* be payable...subject to review and reconciliation,' the obligation to pay undisputed amounts within 30 days becomes uncertain. This contradicts the clear payment terms and could lead to payment delays or disputes.
